TheCode, considering you have no maximal characters, you have no authority 
about maximal leadership. Declaring Iron Raptor leader is something you have 
no authority to do, it'd have to be done through the RPG.

::Zardus/Zenyak::

Zardus recieves Punch's transmission. For once he was thankfull that 
DevilDuer had caused him to set his comm-link to play back messages only in 
his head, or he'd have a lot of trouble explaining that statement to the 
predacons in front of him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Zenyak falls behind a boulder, cursing whoever descovered fire beams. He rubs 
his leg, slightly thankful for the ice that Dracona had shot at him, which 
was cooling the wound.

He growls, looking at the crowd with the giant bot in the middle of them.

It was time to leave, he could see that, the maximals should soon start 
firing on each other.

He smiles. He couldn't possibly leave without a goodbye gift. Zenyak takes 
out a photon grenade.

Chuckling, the predacon pulls the pin and throws it into the middle of Iron 
Raptor and company, turning to run like his life depended on it and ducking 
his head as he hears the grenade explode.

Finally detecting Zenyak, the autoguns open fire.
